position4.description: Facebook applications & backend websites development. Jenkins & Docker practice. Improving internal libraries. Capifony helped deploy.

position2.description: Developed an intern application scrapping social media datas on social websites such as Facebook and Twitter via their APIs.

position1.description: Developed an intern web application managing providers, bank accounts and creating xml files for SEPA bank wire transfers.

position0.description: Helped a blogger build his wordpress blog up, from looking for the best web hosting according his demands to the implementation of the web designer's styled theme.

extra0.description: Visited the east coast from Brisbane to Cairns, then I spent some months in Tokyo, Japan before heading back to France.

personnal2.title: Tweetch
personnal2.description: Browsing through twitch video game content, streams and authenticated user. Built on RiotJs & Symfony2 using TwitchAPIBundle by myself. Hosted on Heroku.

personnal1.title: Bubbles
personnal1.description: Browsing through all marvel comics via REST calls to marvel api, comics from this week, last week or the one next month. Built on RiotJs, Bootstrap & Symfony2 using MarvelAPIBundle by Octante. Hosted on Heroku.

personnal0.title: IreneIsland
personnal0.description: Three JS practice. Single page website showing affiliated description to the image being clicked. Built on SlimPHP.
